    • isFinished

      private boolean isFinished()
      This method returns the Dijkstra algo is finished or not.
      Returns:
      true or false from finished field which is used to indicate the Dijkstra algo is finished or not.

    • isInitialized

      private boolean isInitialized()
      This method returns the Dijkstra algo is initialized or not.

    • init

      private void init()
      This method initializes the Dijkstra algorithm.

    • loop

      public String loop()
      This method finds the shortest path and returns the output of a step.
      Returns:
      the output of a step when finding the shortest path

    • runAll

      public void runAll()
      This method runs loop() if isFinished is false, i.e. the Dijkstra algorithm is not finished.

    • pathToString

      private String pathToString(int[] path)
      This method returns the path in string.
      Parameters:
      path - the path array (containing index of nodes) to be converted to string
      Returns:
      the path in string

    • findPathTo

      private int[] findPathTo(int dest)
      This method finds the path to destination node.
      Parameters:
      dest - the node requested to find the path
      Returns:
      the int[] of path which contains the index of nodes in the path
